subproject.description:
Output 1.1:  Integrated, cross-cultural risk management and adaptation knowledge networks developed.
Output 1.2:  Cadre of climate risk management personnel developed.
Output 2.1:  Institutional structures and legislative systems developed and strengthened.
IOutput 2.2:  Risk reduction and climate change adaptation tools developed and applied.
Output 3.1:  Increased resources allocated for climate risk reduction projects.
Output 3.2:  Partnerships established and strengthened.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Caribbean Risk Management
